website_summaries.verdict: The trail performance of this Columbia hiking boot captures the attention of outdoorsy individuals, thanks to a combination of comfort and lightness. It is also able to provide satisfaction through its grippy outsole and ample cushioning.However, it may not be for everyone because of its inadequate arch support. All in all, the Columbia Redmond V2 Mid Waterproof may fit the bill to those who require a comfy and protective pair, granted its insole is replaced with a supportive variant.
pros: Users in droves are in love with the Columbia Redmond V2 Mid Waterproof’s comfortable feel
A multitude of purchasers find it to be an incredibly lightweight hiking boot
Many consumer reviews state that its outsole delivers ample traction on most types of terrain
According to a couple of shoppers, the Redmond V2 Mid Waterproof gives a cushioned ride
A minority of wearers express their joy over the non-existent break-in period of this Columbia offering
Several outdoor lovers declare it to be effective against various wet trail conditions
cons: A verified buyer says that the stitches found on the Columbia Redmond V2 Mid Waterproof’s upper come apart after a few uses
Based on a few hikers, it provides insufficient arch support
Some owners mention that it is a warm shoe for hiking

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in false colour advertisement.
customer_reviews.text: They are not brown as described or depicted as in the picture, you can clearly see the difference between a brown boot and this grey-ish boot. Sorely disappointed as Columbia do have good products that is comparable to Salomon. These will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Calum RR Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Great boot at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good boots! I needed some new ones for walking and holidays with the dog. Something light, comfortable and water proof. I can’t fault these at all. I’ve had them a week and the weather has been pretty wet so I’ve been able to test them out and they’ve held up well. They’re comfortable, have plenty of padding, my feet are dry, and they were available for much less than the official website.
customer_reviews.author: Harnaik Birring

customer_reviews.title: Great support and good value
customer_reviews.text: Ankle support, sturdiness both very good water proof to a degree, percentage wise I’d say 80%. Not as good as my Merrell Moab 2 WPs.
customer_reviews.author: Nana L

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Needed some footwear that was comfortable good price and up to a walk in the lakes... Step forward Columbia all ticked good footwear
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gouldin

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Second pair leaks at left little toe on wet short grass just like the Fi St returned pair. Do not buy if waterproof expected. Very comfortable and slips on like a slipper. Tempted to treat rather than return again but is not what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: MikeRo

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels great. Tried it in some deep puddles with all the rain although my feet felt cool they were indeed dry. I am pleased so far with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Item was returned to small
customer_reviews.text: Another pair but small fitt to my normal size returned item
customer_reviews.author: L. Price

customer_reviews.title: WET FEET ..
customer_reviews.text: These boots are NOT WATERPROOF. My toes are wet after using these boots on a moderately damp day. Disappointed by Columbia with this product. They are however, comfortable and lightweight, although useless for any type of wet / damp hike.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and comfortable, however these are not waterproof. I just came back from a walk and it was a bit raining and after 15 minutes my feet were wet!
customer_reviews.author: Dimi

customer_reviews.title: Columbia quality
customer_reviews.text: Well made shoes. Good fit unlike some makes where ordering your size is a bit of a lottery. Very comfortable and feel sturdy. Colour is exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Ormston

customer_reviews.title: Non waterproof 'waterproof boot!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a 'waterproof' boot for walking my dogs, stayed 'waterproof' for about 10 days, not wet every day! then started letting in water, so sprayed with waterproofer product lasted a very short time, so 'really' sprayed with water proofing product, lasted a few days, now wet feet again.. So if you re looking for a 'waterproof walking boot, then walk right on by this one!
customer_reviews.author: peter wingate

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and comfortable. Suede on outside is lovely although worried it will get discoloured but time will tell. Seem to have a water resistant coating but again time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These boots are okay if a little on the small side. However, they are not waterproof. Got caught in heavy rain and ended up with wet socks.
customer_reviews.author: C Reid

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof after 20 minutes of rain.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable good for walking but the soles don't have good grip (poor quality) and canvas gets wet after 20 minutes of rain or walking through water.
customer_reviews.author: inthetownwhereiwasborn

customer_reviews.title: Not to sure if I would recommend them
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair , the first pair was letting water in so they weren’t as stated in the write up that they were waterproof . Second pair seem to be ok at the moment but haven’t worn them much in the rain as yet.
customer_reviews.author: mrs jane stoneman

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable & definitely waterproof 💦
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them so much he wears none of his other boots..👍👍👏
customer_reviews.author: Christina Down

product_meta.title: Columbia Men's Redmond V2 MID WP Low Rise Hiking Boots
product_meta.description: For winter hikes in wet or snowy conditions, this durable mid-cut waterproof Columbia hiking shoe provides great traction and comfort. Made with a waterproof, breathable seam-sealed bootie construction for a lightweight sock-like fit, the upper features a combination of suede leather, mesh and webbing. The lightweight midsole ensures long-lasting cushioning on all types of surfaces. The rubber outsole gives you all-terrain traction in both wet and dry conditions.
